me bawa pahadili kirimata ema mahatha idam prathisanskarana komishan sabhawa yatathe ema komishan sabhawa sathu idam thama nadayanuth athulu paksha hithawathunta kunu kollayata labadimata gath kriyamargaya wuwa saheyi.dan eksath jathika pakshayata walandi thibena rogaya ema pakshaya nisakawama walapallata ada damana maha ledak bawa saksudakse pahadiliya.ejapaya dan dangalanne mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma rata jathiya winashayen beragena thibiyadith deshapremin ha ranawiruwange paththa nopakilawa ganimata bari apahasuwakini.ranil wikramasinha mahatha ha ohuge hithawadin thawaduratath yedi sitinne rata adhirajyawadi balawegawalata pawadi ho thama panthiyata balaya laba ganime deshadrohi prayathnayakaya.owunta ee hara janatha yahapatha thaka aaraksha karagatha yuthu kisith saradharmayak natha.ema tharjanayata muhuna di jaya ganimata hama janakotasakatama ayath janathawage prayathnaya wiya yuththe rajapaksha janadhipathithuma wisin itha duradarshiwa godanangagena thibena jathika samagiya diwi dewenikota aaraksha kara ganimaya.wishramika bhasha pariwarthaka em.ke. dharmadasa
